meanings.definition: Love or admiration for Greece and Greek culture.
meanings.sent1: Her philhellenism was evident in her collection of Greek art.
meanings.sent2: Many students develop philhellenism after studying ancient Greek history.
meanings.sent3: His philhellenism led him to throw a toga party in honor of Greek culture.
meanings.sent4: The artist's paintings were a beautiful display of philhellenism.
meanings.sent5: The museum's exhibit showcased the depth of philhellenism in modern society.

meanings.definition: Support for Greece or the Greeks.
meanings.sent1: The country showed its philhellenism by sending aid to Greece after the earthquake.
meanings.sent2: The organization's philhellenism was evident in their efforts to preserve Greek heritage sites.
meanings.sent3: The philhellenism of the community was shown through their fundraising for Greek relief efforts.
meanings.sent4: His actions were a true testament to his philhellenism.
meanings.sent5: The charity event was a display of overwhelming philhellenism towards Greece.
